016package io.micronaut.maven.openapi;
017
018import io.micronaut.openapi.generator.AbstractMicronautJavaCodegen;
019import io.micronaut.openapi.generator.GeneratorOptionsBuilder;
020import io.micronaut.openapi.generator.MicronautCodeGenerator;
021import io.micronaut.openapi.generator.MicronautCodeGeneratorBuilder;
022import org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils;
023import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
024import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.LifecyclePhase;
025import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Mojo;
026import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Parameter;
027
028import java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;
029import java.lang.reflect.Method;
030import java.util.Locale;
031import java.util.Map;
032
033/**
034 * A generic OpenAPI mojo that will be used for configuring custom Micronaut OpenAPI generator extensions.
035 */
036@Mojo(name = OpenApiGenericMojo.MOJO_NAME, defaultPhase = LifecyclePhase.GENERATE_SOURCES)
037public class OpenApiGenericMojo extends AbstractOpenApiMojo {
038    public static final String MOJO_NAME = "generate-openapi-generic";
039    public static final String CONFIGURATION_PROPERTIES = MICRONAUT_OPENAPI_PREFIX + ".generator.properties";
040
041    /**
042     * The classname of the generator to be used for code generation.
043     *
044     * <p>The generator must property overwrite the {@link AbstractMicronautJavaCodegen#optionsBuilder()} method
045     * and the builder should have setters or withers for the properties to be used in maven configuration.</p>
046     */
047    @Parameter(property = MICRONAUT_OPENAPI_PREFIX + ".generator.builder.classname")
048    protected String generatorClassName;
049
050    /**
051     * The configuration properties that will be passed on to the custom generator options builder.
052     *
053     * <p>Any configuration parameters with key {@code micronaut.openapi.generator.properties.[PROPERTY_NAME]}
054     * will be passed on to the generator options builder. String, integer and boolean value types are supported
055     * for additional properties.</p>
056     */
057    @Parameter(property = CONFIGURATION_PROPERTIES)
058    protected Map<String, String> properties;
059
060    @Override
061    protected boolean isEnabled() {
062        return generatorClassName != null;
063    }
064
065    @Override
066    protected void configureBuilder(MicronautCodeGeneratorBuilder builder) throws MojoExecutionException {
067        MicronautCodeGenerator<? extends GeneratorOptionsBuilder> generator = instantiateGenerator();
068
069        try {
070            builder.forCodeGenerator(generator, config -> {
071                for (Map.Entry<String, String> entry : properties.entrySet()) {
072                    String name = entry.getKey().substring(CONFIGURATION_PROPERTIES.length() + 1);
073                    String value = entry.getValue();
074                    invokeMethod(name, config, value);
075                }
076            });
077        } catch (OpenAPIInvocationException e) {
078            throw new MojoExecutionException(e);
079        }
080    }
081
082    private MicronautCodeGenerator<? extends GeneratorOptionsBuilder> instantiateGenerator() {
083        MicronautCodeGenerator<? extends GeneratorOptionsBuilder> generator;
084        try {
085            generator = (MicronautCodeGenerator<? extends GeneratorOptionsBuilder>) this.getClass()
086                    .getClassLoader()
087                    .loadClass(generatorClassName)
088                    .getDeclaredConstructor()
089                    .newInstance();
090        } catch (InstantiationException | IllegalAccessException | InvocationTargetException | NoSuchMethodException | ClassNotFoundException e) {
091            throw new RuntimeException(e);
092        }
093        return generator;
094    }
095
096    private static void invokeMethod(String name, GeneratorOptionsBuilder builder, String value) {
097        try {
098            String witherName = "with" + StringUtils.capitalize(name);
099            String setterName = "set" + StringUtils.capitalize(name);
100            Class<? extends GeneratorOptionsBuilder> builderClazz = builder.getClass();
101            var methods = builderClazz.getDeclaredMethods();
102            for (Method method : methods) {
103                if (invokeIfMatches(name, builder, value, witherName, setterName, method)) {
104                    return;
105                }
106            }
107            throw new OpenAPIInvocationException("Unable to find a method on builder " + builderClazz + " with name '" + name + "' which accepts argument '" + value + "'");
108        } catch (IllegalAccessException | InvocationTargetException ex) {
109            throw new OpenAPIInvocationException(ex);
110        }
111    }
112
113    private static boolean invokeIfMatches(String name, GeneratorOptionsBuilder builder, String value, String witherName, String setterName, Method method) throws IllegalAccessException, InvocationTargetException {
114        var methodName = method.getName();
115        if ((methodName.equals(name) || methodName.equals(witherName) || methodName.equals(setterName)) && method.getParameterCount() == 1) {
116            Class<?> parameterType = method.getParameterTypes()[0];
117            if (parameterType.equals(String.class)) {
118                method.invoke(builder, value);
119                return true;
120            } else if (parameterType.equals(Boolean.TYPE)) {
121                var coerced = value.toLowerCase(Locale.US);
122                if ("true".equals(coerced) || "false".equals(coerced)) {
123                    method.invoke(builder, Boolean.parseBoolean(coerced));
124                    return true;
125                }
126            } else if (parameterType.equals(Integer.TYPE) && (value.matches("[0-9]+"))) {
127                    method.invoke(builder, Integer.parseInt(value));
128                    return true;
129
130            }
131        }
132        return false;
133    }
134
135    /**
136     * Exception to be thrown when OpenAPI generator configuration fails.
137     */
138    static class OpenAPIInvocationException extends RuntimeException {
139        public OpenAPIInvocationException(String message) {
140            super(message);
141        }
142
143        public OpenAPIInvocationException(Throwable throwable) {
144            super(throwable);
145        }
146    }
147}
